status.title: 状态
status.text: 块的当前状态(完成中或已完成).

gas_used.title: Gas用量
gas_used.text: 该区块中交易使用的gas总量.

gas_prise.title: Gas价格
gas_prise.text: 中文_A unit of Tgas (TeraGas) is 1*10^12 units of gas. The costs of gas are very low in terms of NEAR, which is why Tgas is more commonly used.

hash.title: 哈希
hash.text: 该区块的唯一标识符(哈希).

parent_hash.title: 父哈希
parent_hash.text: 前一个区块的唯一标识符(哈希).

transactions.text: 此帐户发送和接收的总交易量.

storage_usage.title: 存储占用
storage_usage.text: 中文_Total blockchain storage (in bytes) used by this account.

native_account_balance.title: Ⓝ 本地账户余额
native_account_balance.text: 中文_NEAR protocol defines a liquid balance for every account, this is directly used to pay for transactions issued by this account, but it is not the "total" balance of all the tokens you may control through this account; see "Aggregated Balace" for more details.

validator_stake.title: Ⓝ 验证者质押
validator_stake.text:
中文_

This NEAR is actively being used to back a validator and secure the network. When you decide to unstake this NEAR, it will take some time to be shown in your Available Balance, as NEAR takes 3 epochs (~36 hours) to unstake.

This field only reflects NEAR balance for validators that stake to support the security of the network. If you’re staking (delegating) to a validator pool from a wallet, you will see "0" in this field. See the balance profile on Wallet for more balances aggregated for your convenience.

balance_profile.title: Ⓝ 余额概况
balance_profile.text: 中文_NEAR tokens can be locked in contracts, staked, and delegated, and sometimes we cannot even track them down without your help. Wallet Profile page is the place where we consolidate most of the balances we can aggregate from various sources, so if you want to estimate "total" balance, it is the best place.

created_at.title: 创建于
created_at.text: 中文_Date and time when this account was created. Some of the accounts are included in the very first block of the network called genesis.

created_by_transaction.title: 被交易创建
created_by_transaction.text: 中文_You can inspect the transaction which created this account.

deleted_at.title: 删除于
deleted_at.text: 中文_Date and time when this account was deleted.

deleted_by_transaction.title: 被交易删除
deleted_by_transaction.text: 中文_You can inspect the transaction which deleted this account.

lockup_account.title: 锁仓账户
lockup_account.text: 中文_Lockup is a special smart contract that ensures that the full amount or even a partial amount is not transferable until it is supposed to be.

nodes_validating.title: 正在验证的节点
nodes_validating.text: 正在验证的节点的总数

block_height.title: 区块高度
block_height.text1: 最新记录到区块链上的区块的高度。
block_height.text2: 区块高度是区块链上最新的快的序号。
block_height.text3: 例如，区块高度为1000意味着至多已经有1001个区块存在在区块链上（创世区块 + 随后的1000个区块）。在NEAR上，不能保证每个序号都有对应的区块产生，比如序号为982的区块并不一定存在。

avg_block_time.title: 平均出块时间
avg_block_time.text: 产生一个区快的平均时间

24h_total.title: 24小时总数
24h_total.text: 过于24小时内的交易数量。

gas_price.title: Gas价格
gas_price.text: Tgas (TerraGas) 是 10^12 个单位Gas. 由于如果用 NEAR 计费，Gas的数字会相当小，所以TGas是更常用的。

Search.title: 搜索
Search.hint: 搜：账户ID、交易哈希、区块哈希、区块高度

Update.refresh_words: 刷新或单击以查看最新数据.
